meanings.definition: A contagious viral infection causing swelling of the salivary glands, especially the parotid glands.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed Tim with mumps after his cheeks swelled up.
meanings.sent2: Children are vaccinated to prevent mumps and other diseases.
meanings.sent3: When Sarah got mumps, she looked like a chipmunk storing nuts in her cheeks.
meanings.sent4: The mumps spread through the school like wildfire, affecting many students.
meanings.sent5: The pain from mumps made eating difficult for little Emily.

meanings.definition: Swelling of the salivary glands caused by the mumps virus.
meanings.sent1: The nurse confirmed that the swelling was due to mumps.
meanings.sent2: The outbreak of mumps led to school closures for sanitation.
meanings.sent3: Tom joked that his mumps made him look like a cartoon character.
meanings.sent4: The mumps virus attacked the glands like a silent intruder.
meanings.sent5: The discomfort from mumps made sleeping a challenge for Alex.
